cyclone.name: BILL
cyclone.current_location: about 160 mi ESE of Port O'Connor Texas and 155 mi SSE of Galveston Texas
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the middle Texas coast and then inland across south-central Texas

weather_observation.warning_coast: Baffin Bay to High Island, Texas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Middle and upper Texas coast and adjacent western Louisiana coast
weather_observation.wind: Only isolated gusts below tropical-storm force expected; sustained TS winds unlikely at Brownsville (probability <3%).
weather_observation.storm_surge: No significant surge expected; water rise should stay below 2 ft along lower Texas coast near Brownsville.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain-bands could drop 1â€“3 inches, locally higher in squalls Tuesday.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None expected that would materially affect port operations.
